```{r KnitrOpts, echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = normalizePath('../'))
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=TRUE, message=TRUE, warning=TRUE, error=TRUE)
```

This module will gather ACS data by census tract for Durham county. At present, we are only gathering income data.

```{r}
library(acs)
api.key.install("1b17fc10178254f0b1e185d82a40b055b46dab63")
durham <- geo.make(state = "NC"
                   , county = "Durham"
                   , tract = "*"
                   , check = TRUE)

objIncome <- acs.fetch(2014, geography = durham, table.name = "B19013", col.names = "pretty")
```

```{r GatherObjects}
lstObjects <- represtools::ListObjects("obj")
represtools::DescribeObjects(lstObjects, str)
```

```{r Save}
save(file = represtools::OutputFile(params)
     , list = lstObjects)
```
